EmailTemplate.name: Second Attempt at Contact: Project in Process
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Recent Purchase with VinSolutions: How are we doing?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
VinSolutions would like to know what you think! We have attempted to contact you to discuss your experience with us during the implementation process of your most recent products, and we’re sorry to have missed you!
We welcome you to take our brief customer service survey by clicking on the Tell Vin link below. If you would prefer to take this survey in person, please feel free to call me at {!User.Phone} at your convenience.
Tell Vin
Thank you, and have a wonderful day!
